languages.text: {n}Почуяв паузу в рассказе, Абеляр сонно встряхивает головой.{/n} "А? Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость, я... задумался. Весьма увлекательно, весьма. Вижу, что с историей у вас и правда все блистательно, а значит, мое присутствие тут не требуется!" {n}Сенешаль поспешно пятится к выходу.{/n}

{n}Sensing a pause in the lecture, Abelard shakes himself awake.{/n} "Hmm? I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I was... lost in thought. A thoroughly captivating subject, yes. Well, I see that you are indeed remarkably versed in history, and therefore my presence is not required at the moment!" {n}He hurriedly backs his way toward the exit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard spürte eine Pause in deinem Vortrag und rüttelt sich selbst wach.{/n} "Hmm? Bitte verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich war ... in Gedanken. In der Tat ein fesselndes Thema, ja. Nun, wie ich sehe, seid Ihr geschichtlich in der Tat ausgesprochen versiert. Meine Gegenwart ist also nicht länger erforderlich." {n}Er eilt schnellen Schrittes zum Ausgang.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing a pause in the lecture, Abelard shakes himself awake.{/n} "Hmm? I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I was... lost in thought. A thoroughly captivating subject, yes. Well, I see that you are indeed remarkably versed in history, and therefore my presence is not required at the moment!" {n}He hurriedly backs his way toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard spürte eine Pause in deinem Vortrag und rüttelt sich selbst wach.{/n} "Hmm? "Bitte verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich war ... in Gedanken. In der Tat ein fesselndes Thema, ja. Nun, wie ich sehe, seid Ihr geschichtlich in der Tat ausgesprochen versiert. Meine Gegenwart ist also nicht länger erforderlich." {n}Er eilt schnellen Schrittes zum Ausgang.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Percevant une pause dans votre discours interminable, Abélard secoue la tête comme pour se réveiller.{/n} « Hmm ? Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie, j'étais... perdu dans mes pensées. Un sujet tout bonnement captivant, en effet. À l'évidence, vous êtes vous-même {mf|féru|férue} d'histoire et vous n'avez pas besoin de moi dans l'immédiat ! » {n}Il se dépêche de gagner la sortie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing a pause in the lecture, Abelard shakes himself awake.{/n} "Hmm? I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I was... lost in thought. A thoroughly captivating subject, yes. Well, I see that you are indeed remarkably versed in history, and therefore my presence is not required at the moment!" {n}He hurriedly backs his way toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Percevant une pause dans votre discours interminable, Abélard secoue la tête comme pour se réveiller.{/n} « Hmm ? Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie, j'étais... perdu dans mes pensées. Un sujet tout bonnement captivant, en effet. À l'évidence, vous êtes vous-même {mf|féru|férue} d'histoire et vous n'avez pas besoin de moi dans l'immédiat ! » {n}Il se dépêche de gagner la sortie.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Al notar una pausa en el discurso, Abelard espabila.{/n} «¿Mmm? Le ruego que me disculpe, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Estaba... absorto. Es un tema de conversación absolutamente fascinante, sí. Bueno, veo que efectivamente entiende mucho de historia, ¡y por lo tanto mi presencia es innecesaria en este momento!». {n}Se apresura en salir de la sala.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing a pause in the lecture, Abelard shakes himself awake.{/n} "Hmm? I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I was... lost in thought. A thoroughly captivating subject, yes. Well, I see that you are indeed remarkably versed in history, and therefore my presence is not required at the moment!" {n}He hurriedly backs his way toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al notar una pausa en el discurso, Abelard espabila.{/n} «¿Mmm? Le ruego que me disculpe, mi{mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Estaba... absorto. Es un tema de conversación absolutamente fascinante, sí. Bueno, veo que efectivamente entiende mucho de historia, ¡y por lo tanto mi presencia es innecesaria en este momento!». {n}Se apresura en salir de la sala.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}講義が中断したことに気づき、アベラルドがハッと目を覚ます。{/n}「おや？失礼しました、陛下。少し…考え込んでいたようです。実に興味深い題材ですね。なるほど、あなたは確かに歴史に造詣が深くあられるようです。であれば今のところ、私の出番はなさそうですな！」{n}彼は慌てたように出口へと向かう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing a pause in the lecture, Abelard shakes himself awake.{/n} "Hmm? I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I was... lost in thought. A thoroughly captivating subject, yes. Well, I see that you are indeed remarkably versed in history, and therefore my presence is not required at the moment!" {n}He hurriedly backs his way toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}講義が中断したことに気づき、アベラルドがハッと目を覚ます。{/n}「おや？失礼しました、陛下。少し…考え込んでいたようです。実に興味深い題材ですね。なるほど、あなたは確かに歴史に造詣が深くあられるようです。であれば今のところ、私の出番はなさそうですな！」{n}彼は慌てたように出口へと向かう。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德感觉到你停了下来，随后立刻摇醒了自己。{/n}“嗯？请原谅我，大人。我刚刚……陷入了沉思，没错，这个话题确实非常吸引人。看得出来，您确实对王朝的历史了如指掌，因此，您应该不需要我留在这里了！”{n}他匆匆忙忙退到了出口处。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing a pause in the lecture, Abelard shakes himself awake.{/n} "Hmm? I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I was... lost in thought. A thoroughly captivating subject, yes. Well, I see that you are indeed remarkably versed in history, and therefore my presence is not required at the moment!" {n}He hurriedly backs his way toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德感觉到你停了下来，随后立刻摇醒了自己。{/n}“嗯？请原谅我，大人。我刚刚……陷入了沉思，没错，这个话题确实非常吸引人。看得出来，您确实对王朝的历史了如指掌，因此，您应该不需要我留在这里了！”{n}他匆匆忙忙退到了出口处。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Anlatmaya ara verdiğini anlayan Abelard, kendini ayılmaya zorluyor.{/n} "Hımm? Affınızı rica ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ben... Düşüncelere dalmışım. Son derece ilgi çekici bir konu, evet. Tarih konusunda gerçekten de muazzam bilgili olduğunuzu görüyorum, dolayısıyla şu an burada bulunmam için bir lüzum yok!" {n}Hızla çıkışa yöneliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing a pause in the lecture, Abelard shakes himself awake.{/n} "Hmm? I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I was... lost in thought. A thoroughly captivating subject, yes. Well, I see that you are indeed remarkably versed in history, and therefore my presence is not required at the moment!" {n}He hurriedly backs his way toward the exit.{/n}
